participant_1.background:
My pets are a constant source of comfort and love.
i am bipolar.
I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it.
I've had my cards read a couple of times.
I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart.

participant_2.background:
I am new to my job, but I have been fascinated by ghosts since graduating from Princeton.
i can do convincing bird calls.
i graduated college for secondary english education.
my favorite activity is fishing.
i live with my husband and two children.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking!
That's great to hear! I'm doing well myself.
I'm glad to hear that!
What are you up to today?
I'm working on a project for my job.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What kind of project is it?
It's a research project on the history of ghost sightings in Princeton.
That sounds like a really cool project! I've always been fascinated by ghosts.
Me too! I'm excited to learn more about them.
I'm sure you'll learn a lot. What is your favorite ghost story?
That's a tough question. I have a few favorites. One is the story of the Headless Horseman of Sleepy Hollow.
Oh, I love that story! I've seen the movie and read the book.
It's such a classic. I love the way the story is told.
Me too. It's so suspenseful.
I'm glad you like it. It's one of my favorites.
I'm sure you'll find some great information for your project.
I hope so! I'm excited to start researching it.
I'm sure you'll do a great job.
Thank you
